page.title: 05A Trailer Business,Ellesmere
page.content: There is a firm called CRV Trailers at Sodylt Bank.They remove and repair the chassies to the standard required to make them safe on the road. The work involves renovating the trailer:floor boards are put in first and then the wall boards. Rosewood and various other attractive wood panels are used on the inside. Trailers can be ordered to any design. Some will have seats in them and others will have beds. Electricity is wired in, carpet laid and the whole caravan is painted. The average price charged is Â£1,600 but some larger trailers cost more. Some caravans or trailers can be hired.
